display_html: generator :: Lang -> String -> [Expr] -> Choices -> CodeSpec -> DrasilState
name: generator

display_html: generateCode :: (OOProg progRepr, PackageSym packRepr) => Lang -> (progRepr (Program progRepr) -> ProgData) -> (packRepr (Package packRepr) -> PackData) -> DrasilState -> IO ()
name: generateCode

display_html: generateCodeProc :: (ProcProg progRepr, PackageSym packRepr) => Lang -> (progRepr (Program progRepr) -> ProgData) -> (packRepr (Package packRepr) -> PackData) -> DrasilState -> IO ()
name: generateCodeProc

display_html:
data Choices = Choices {
  • lang :: [Lang]
  • architecture :: Architecture
  • dataInfo :: DataInfo
  • maps :: Maps
  • optFeats :: OptionalFeatures
  • srsConstraints :: Constraints
  • extLibs :: [ExtLib]
  • icNames :: InternalConcept -> Name
  • folderVal :: Int
}
name: Choices Choices dataInfo lang architecture maps optFeats srsConstraints extLibs icNames folderVal

display_html:
data Architecture = Archt {
  • modularity :: Modularity
  • impType :: ImplementationType
}
name: Architecture Archt modularity impType

display_html:
data Maps = Maps {
  • conceptMatch :: ConceptMatchMap
  • spaceMatch :: SpaceMatch
}
name: Maps Maps conceptMatch spaceMatch

display_html:
data LogConfig = LogConfig {
  • logging :: [Logging]
  • logFile :: FilePath
}
name: LogConfig LogConfig logging logFile

display_html:
data OptionalFeatures = OptFeats {
  • docConfig :: DocConfig
  • logConfig :: LogConfig
  • auxFiles :: [AuxFile]
}
name: OptionalFeatures OptFeats docConfig logConfig auxFiles

display_html:
data AuxFile
  • = SampleInput FilePath
  • | ReadME
name: AuxFile SampleInput ReadME

display_html:
data CodeSpec = CS {
  • _system' :: System
  • _oldCode :: OldCodeSpec
}
name: CodeSpec CS _system' _oldCode

display_html:
data OldCodeSpec = OldCodeSpec {
  • _pName :: Name
  • _authors :: People
  • _inputs :: [Input]
  • _extInputs :: [Input]
  • _derivedInputs :: [Derived]
  • _outputs :: [Output]
  • _configFiles :: [FilePath]
  • _execOrder :: [Def]
  • _cMap :: ConstraintCEMap
  • _constants :: [Const]
  • _constMap :: ConstantMap
  • _mods :: [Mod]
  • _systemdb :: ChunkDB
}
name: OldCodeSpec OldCodeSpec _authors _configFiles _inputs _outputs _constants _systemdb _pName _extInputs _derivedInputs _execOrder _cMap _constMap _mods

display_html: codeSpec :: System -> Choices -> [Mod] -> CodeSpec
name: codeSpec

display_html:
class HasOldCodeSpec c where
  • oldCodeSpec :: Lens' c OldCodeSpec
  • authorsO :: Lens' c People
  • cMapO :: Lens' c ConstraintCEMap
  • configFilesO :: Lens' c [FilePath]
  • constMapO :: Lens' c ConstantMap
  • constantsO :: Lens' c [Const]
  • derivedInputsO :: Lens' c [Derived]
  • execOrderO :: Lens' c [Def]
  • extInputsO :: Lens' c [Input]
  • inputsO :: Lens' c [Input]
  • modsO :: Lens' c [Mod]
  • outputsO :: Lens' c [Output]
  • pNameO :: Lens' c Name
  • systemdbO :: Lens' c ChunkDB
name: HasOldCodeSpec oldCodeSpec pNameO authorsO inputsO extInputsO derivedInputsO outputsO configFilesO execOrderO cMapO constantsO constMapO modsO systemdbO

display_html: ($:=) :: (Quantity c, MayHaveUnit c, Concept c) => c -> CodeExpr -> FuncStmt
data Mod = Mod Name Description [Import] [Class] [Func]
name: Mod Mod

display_html:
data FuncStmt where
  • FAsg :: CodeVarChunk -> CodeExpr -> FuncStmt
  • FAsgIndex :: CodeVarChunk -> Integer -> CodeExpr -> FuncStmt
  • FFor :: CodeVarChunk -> CodeExpr -> CodeExpr -> CodeExpr -> [FuncStmt] -> FuncStmt
  • FForEach :: CodeVarChunk -> CodeExpr -> [FuncStmt] -> FuncStmt
  • FWhile :: CodeExpr -> [FuncStmt] -> FuncStmt
  • FCond :: CodeExpr -> [FuncStmt] -> [FuncStmt] -> FuncStmt
  • FRet :: CodeExpr -> FuncStmt
  • FThrow :: String -> FuncStmt
  • FTry :: [FuncStmt] -> [FuncStmt] -> FuncStmt
  • FContinue :: FuncStmt
  • FDecDef :: CodeVarChunk -> CodeExpr -> FuncStmt
  • FFuncDef :: CodeFuncChunk -> [ParameterChunk] -> [FuncStmt] -> FuncStmt
  • FVal :: CodeExpr -> FuncStmt
  • FMulti :: [FuncStmt] -> FuncStmt
  • FAppend :: CodeExpr -> CodeExpr -> FuncStmt
name: FuncStmt FAsg FAsgIndex FFor FForEach FWhile FCond FRet FThrow FTry FContinue FDecDef FFuncDef FVal FMulti FAppend

display_html: fDecDef :: (Quantity c, MayHaveUnit c, Concept c) => c -> CodeExpr -> FuncStmt
name: fDecDef

display_html: ffor :: (Quantity c, MayHaveUnit c, Concept c) => c -> CodeExpr -> [FuncStmt] -> FuncStmt
name: ffor

display_html: fforRange :: (Quantity c, MayHaveUnit c, Concept c) => c -> CodeExpr -> CodeExpr -> CodeExpr -> [FuncStmt] -> FuncStmt
name: fforRange

display_html: funcData :: Name -> Description -> DataDesc -> Func
name: funcData

display_html: funcDef :: (Quantity c, MayHaveUnit c, Concept c) => Name -> Description -> [c] -> Space -> Maybe Description -> [FuncStmt] -> Func
name: funcDef

name: packmod

display_html: methodInfo :: CodeFuncChunk -> Description -> [Parameter] -> Description -> [Step] -> MethodInfo
name: methodInfo

display_html:
data StepFill
  • = CallF FunctionIntFill
  • | LoopF (NonEmpty FunctionIntFill) [CodeExpr] (NonEmpty StepFill)
  • | StatementF [CodeVarChunk] [CodeExpr]
name: StepFill CallF LoopF StatementF

display_html:
data ArgumentFill
  • = UserDefinedArgF (Maybe NamedArgument) CodeExpr
  • | BasicF CodeExpr
  • | FnF [ParameterFill] StepFill
  • | ClassF [StateVariable] ClassInfoFill
  • | RecordF [CodeExpr]
name: ArgumentFill UserDefinedArgF BasicF FnF ClassF RecordF

display_html:
data Lang
  • = Cpp
  • | CSharp
  • | Java
  • | Python
  • | Swift
  • | Julia
name: Lang Cpp CSharp Java Python Swift Julia

display_html:
class AuxiliarySym r => PackageSym r where
  • type Package r
  • package :: ProgData -> [r (Auxiliary r)] -> r (Package r)
name: PackageSym Package package

display_html:
class AuxiliarySym r where
  • type Auxiliary r
  • type AuxHelper r
  • doxConfig :: String -> GOOLState -> Verbosity -> r (Auxiliary r)
  • readMe :: ReadMeInfo -> r (Auxiliary r)
  • sampleInput :: ChunkDB -> DataDesc -> [Expr] -> r (Auxiliary r)
  • optimizeDox :: r (AuxHelper r)
  • makefile :: [FilePath] -> ImplementationType -> [Comments] -> GOOLState -> ProgData -> r (Auxiliary r)
  • auxHelperDoc :: r (AuxHelper r) -> Doc
  • auxFromData :: FilePath -> Doc -> r (Auxiliary r)
name: AuxiliarySym Auxiliary AuxHelper doxConfig readMe sampleInput makefile auxHelperDoc auxFromData optimizeDox

name: quantvar

name: quantfunc

data ODEInfo = ODEInfo {

  • depVar :: CodeVarChunk

  • tFinal :: CodeExpr
  • initVal :: [CodeExpr]
  • odeSyst :: [CodeExpr]
  • odeOpts :: ODEOptions
}

data ODEOptions = ODEOpts {

  • relTol :: CodeExpr
  • stepSize :: CodeExpr
}

  • | Adams

data ODELibPckg = ODELib {
  • libName :: Name
  • libVers :: Version
  • libSpec :: ExternalLibrary
  • libCall :: ODEInfo -> ExternalLibraryCall
  • libPath :: Maybe FilePath
  • compatibleLangs :: [Lang]
}
name: ODELibPckg ODELib libName libVers libSpec libCall libPath compatibleLangs
